result.name: survey-ina-k-2-08-part-of-thames-bass-survey-fv-ina-k-fss-inakthames
result.notes:
This survey was undertaken by Cefas as part of the Thames Bass Survey, FV Ina 
K (FSS: INAKTHAMES);

To provide abundance indices of 0-2 year old bass in the Thames area. Annual 
survey taking place in November each year using the standard Cefas bass trawls 
(deployed port and starboard). This survey was co-funded and co-staffed by the 
Environment Agency.

Station, catch, length (for all species) and biological data (for bass) was 
collected for each of the annual surveys.

Survey took place between 01/12/2008 and 06/12/2008 on INA K

Equipment used during this survey :


-   Otter Trawl Solent Bass Trawl 5 fm Headline, 6 & 8 metre bridles, 40mm 
    Liner
-   Solent Bass Trawl Port
-   Solent Bass Trawl Star

Survey operations were undertaken on 35 stations

74 different species were caught on this survey

organization.name: marine-environmental-data-information-network
organization.title: Marine Environmental Data & Information Network
organization.description: MEDIN is a partnership of UK organisations committed to improving access to marine data. Our partners are both public and private sector.

result.title: Survey : INA K 2/08 (part of Thames Bass Survey, FV Ina K (FSS: INAKTHAMES))

resources.description: The Cefas Data Portal contains metadata records and data sets available to download and connect to in support of our commitment to open science. Data is available in the following formats: CSV, ESRI Shapefile. The data can also be accessed via the WFS and WMS protocols.
resources.name: Cefas Data Portal
